problem_text_cn: 如图,四条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3},l_{4}被直线l_{5},l_{6}所截,AB:BC:CD=1:2:3,若FG=3,则线段EF和线段GH的长度之和是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, four parallel straight lines l_{N_0},l_{N_1},l_{N_2},l_{N_3} are intercepted by straight lines l_{N_4},l_{N_5}, AB:BC:CD=N_6:N_7:N_8, if FG=N_9, then the sum of the lengths of line segment EF and line segment GH is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},∴\frac{EF}{FG}=\frac{AB}{BC},即\frac{EF}{3}=\frac{1}{2},解得,EF=,∵l_{2}∥l_{3}∥l_{4},∴\frac{FG}{GH}=\frac{BC}{CD},即\frac{3}{GH}=\frac{2}{3},解得GH=\frac{9}{2},则线段EF和线段GH的长度之和=\frac{3}{2}+\frac{9}{2}=6,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,灵活运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
